item.title: Mentioned by The Epoch Times
item.description:
Gruelling Canadian Parliament Sitting Wraps Up
NDP MP Linda Duncan, seen in the foyer of the House of Commons June 18, 2013, blamed the Prime Minister's Office for pushing Tory MPs to take positions that bring out greater partisan rivalry. (Matthew Little/Epoch Times). I would like the PMO to back off ...
